document.full_text: alabama has suffered "massive destruction of property" inflicted by storms and tornadoes and at least 131 people are confirmed dead, state governor robert bentley said on thursday.
document.title: alabama says tornado destruction "massive", 131 dead
lines_and_colors: alabama has suffered "massive destruction of property" inflicted by storms and tornadoes and at least 131 people are confirmed dead, state governor robert bentley said on thursday.
